Why Join CREW?

We're committed to leading change

Experience unparalleled business development, leadership opportunities and networking growth locally through chapter’s events and internationally through CREW Network’s, Leadership Summits, annual Convention & Marketplace, and more regularly, through webinars and conference calls.

9,500+
Member Base
200+
Exclusive Job Opportunities
Lower
Membership Dues

How to Join

1
Locate CREW near you
2
Apply for CREW Membership
3
Pay dues & build your profile
4
Grow your business & network

Qualifications

Five (5) years' experience in a "qualified field of commercial real estate" and employed full time in a professional position, the primary responsibilities of which are in a "qualified field of commercial real estate."

*Qualifications may vary depending on your selected CREW
